title: Input, $$t$$
text: The input is $$t=0$$, so $$0$$ minutes after noon, which is equivalent to at noon.

title: Output
text: $$f(t)=volume$$ of a tank of gasoline in gallons, so $$f(0)=volume$$ of a tank of gasoline in gallons at $$t=0$$.

title: Explanation
text: At noon, the volume of the tank of gasoline is $$600$$ gallons.
